Sleepker app is designed to help you monitor your sleeping patterns. Before we get started, please login or sign up to continue.
To keep tracking your sleep, please login using your personal information.
Let\'s get you all set up so you can start exploring the app.
Please enter your registered email address and we\'ll send you a link to reset your password.
Now let\'s get to know you and your sleeping habits to validate your signup request.
Enter your new data in the provided field and press update to save your changes.
To help us determine your sleep quality, please select your wake up mood below.

These Terms of Use constitute a legal agreement (the “agreement”) between you and Sleepker, a service provided by RJH Studio (“us”, “we”) for the use of the Sleepker mobile app (hereafter referred to as “the app” or “Sleepker”), the computer systems and files used by the application, and all related services, features and content provided by Sleepker within the app, on the website or social media channels.

Please read this agreement carefully. By using Sleepker’s services, you acknowledge your acceptance of and agreement to the terms in this agreement. If you do not agree to any of the terms in this agreement, please do not use the app.
We may make modifications to this agreement occasionally. Continued use of the app after the effective date of the updated version will indicate your acceptance of the new agreement.

Sleepker is not a medical device or intended to replace professional medical advice and/or diagnosis. Sleepker is not intended to diagnose or treat sleep disorders or medical conditions. Please consult with a licensed physician before making any decisions or taking any actions that may affect your health, safety and wellbeing.

Do not disregard professional advice because of anything you have seen, heard, or read in the Sleepker app, website or social media channels. Always consult with a healthcare professional if you have any questions or concerns about your sleep or general health.
Your Use of The App, Website and Other Communication Channels

Any information submitted by you through the app, or sleep data recorded whilst using the app is governed by Sleepker’s Privacy Policy. You are responsible for all your activity within the app. If you submit feedback via the app or directly via the support email channels, you are responsible for these communications.

We collect certain information when you use our application. Your use of these channels is not to be considered private. Information as to what this data includes, why it is collected and how it is handled by us and others can be found in our Privacy Policy.
\u2022 You agree that if you do any of the following, you are in breach of this agreement:
\u2022 Sell, rent, lease, loan, sublicense, distribute or transfer the rights to the app or associated content;
\u2022 Modify, reverse engineer or disassemble the app;
\u2022 Copy, adapt, modify, translate the app without our consent;
\u2022 Permit others to use the app in a manner that is in breach of the terms of this agreement;
\u2022 Disable any measures in the app that are designed for protection of intellectual property;
\u2022 Attempt to navigate around measures adopted to control access to content protected by copyright;
\u2022 To compile data in a way that is usable by a competitor product/service;
\u2022 Any such use shall immediately terminate your license to use the app.

Full use of Sleepker’s service requires the use of a mobile device and adequate software/hardware specifications. The maintenance and security of your device may impact upon the performance of Sleepker. It is your responsibility to check your equipment’s suitability to deliver the app’s features.

All rights, including any trademarks, service marks, trade names and copyrighted content (collectively “Intellectual Property”) presented within the app are the property of Letalu.co. We allow you a license to access Sleepker for personal and non-commercial use in accordance with the terms of this agreement.

Any rights that are not permitted within this agreement are reserved by RJH Studio If you wish to use any features of Sleepker’s app for non-personal purposes, including but not limited to software, name, logo, domain name, unique terminologies or any feature associated with the Sleepker brand, you must obtain permission from the company. You can request this by contacting sleepkerapp@gmail.com
If you believe that any content within the app infringes your copyright, you may request it be removed for the app by providing the following information:
\u2022 Identification of the copyrighted material you believe to be infringed. This requires a description of the material and its location.
\u2022 Identification of the material you believe to be infringing and its location. Provide a description and a URL or any information that can help us locate the material.
\u2022 Your details including a name, address, telephone number and email address if available.
\u2022 A statement that you have reasonable certainty that the use of such material was not authorized by the copyright owner.
\u2022 A statement that the information you have supplied is accurate indicating that you are the copyright owner or authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner.
\u2022 A signature or the copyright owner or an authorized representative.
If you have any questions or comments about anything within this Terms of Use agreement please contact us via sleepkerapp@gmail.com
Stick to a sleep schedule
Pay attention to what you eat and drink
Engage in regular physical activity.

Maintain a regular sleep pattern everyday. Stick to your sleep schedule. On going lack of sleep increases risks of health problems. Therefor, despite having busy schedule, you will still have an enough high-quality sleep every week to improve your body, memory, mood, and performance.

Avoid or lower your large meals, alcohol and caffeine intake at night. According to researchers, people who used nicotine and alcohol within hours of going to bed felt the largest impact on their sleep cycle, affecting their quantity and quality of sleep. So, adjust to a healthier lifestyle.

Regular physical activity can promote better sleep. It helps to lessen sleep complaints and avoid insomia. Meditation and other relaxing techniques can also improve better sleep quality and regulate the sleep-wake cycle.

Hello blank fragment
Pioneering Sleep Tracking for Enhanced Well-being

In the fast-paced world we inhabit, it has become increasingly evident that quality sleep is a fundamental pillar of our overall well-being. Recognizing the pressing need for a comprehensive solution to address the sleep challenges faced by individuals, RJH Studio embarked on a mission to develop an innovative sleep tracking application.

Our story began with a group of visionary individuals who were deeply passionate about unraveling the mysteries of sleep and its impact on human performance. Equipped with a shared vision, extensive research, and a commitment to excellence, our team of experts embarked on a journey to pioneer a state-of-the-art sleep tracking platform.

Driven by the belief that a data-driven approach to sleep could transform lives, we dedicated countless hours to understanding the intricacies of sleep patterns, exploring emerging technologies, and collaborating with leading sleep scientists. Our unwavering determination to unlock the true potential of sleep led us to create a sophisticated app that seamlessly integrates cutting-edge technology with user-friendly features.

Through meticulous development and continuous refinement, we designed our sleep tracking application to provide users with valuable insights into their sleep habits, helping them optimize their routines and make informed decisions to enhance their overall well-being. With our app, users can effortlessly monitor their sleep cycles, track sleep duration and efficiency, and gain deep insights into the quality of their rest.

We recognized the importance of not only tracking sleep but also empowering individuals to take actionable steps toward achieving better sleep. Our app goes beyond data analysis, offering personalized recommendations based on sleep trends and environmental factors. We provide users with the knowledge and tools to create an ideal sleep environment, optimize their sleep hygiene, and wake up feeling rejuvenated and ready to conquer the day.

At RJH Studio, we understand the value of privacy and data security. We have implemented stringent measures to ensure that user data is safeguarded, employing industry-leading encryption protocols and anonymization techniques. Our commitment to transparency and control means that users retain ownership of their data, granting them the freedom to manage their preferences and maintain complete peace of mind.

We are proud to introduce our revolutionary sleep tracking application, empowering individuals to take charge of their sleep health and transform their lives. Join us on this remarkable journey toward better sleep, enhanced well-being, and unparalleled performance.
Our vision is to transform sleep health by providing an insightful sleep tracker app that helps users understand their sleep patterns and improve their well-being.

We are dedicated to creating an intuitive sleep tracker app that goes beyond basic data collection. Our mission is to empower users with comprehensive analysis of their sleep quality and patterns. We aim to enable informed decisions for better sleep habits and overall physical and mental wellness.

As 4th-year Computer Engineering students at Polytechnic University of the Philippines, we passionately believe in the importance of obtaining sufficient sleep for maintaining optimal health and well-being. Our goal is to develop a sleep tracker application that enables users to comprehend, monitor, and analyze their sleep patterns and wake-up mood.

With Sleepker\'s features and analysis, our aim is to support users in building healthier sleep habits. However, while we strive to provide valuable insights, we humbly suggest seeking advice from a healthcare professional if you experience persistent sleep issues. Your well-being is our utmost priority, and we\'re here to lend a helping hand on your sleep improvement journey. Join us on this path to a restful sleep with Sleepker!
